llm-chat-welcome-msg: Hi! Im WiChat, can I help you with something?
llm-chat-error-msg: Sorry, I don't have any clues available.
exit-confirm-msg-title: Are you sure you want to exit?
exit-confirm-msg-body: You will lose your progress in this game.
password-error-min-length: Password must be at least 8 characters long.
rules-content-1: 1. WiChat is a trivia game with a limited time.
rules-content-2: 2. There are two modes: Quick Game and Chaos Mode.
rules-content-3: 3. In Quick Game, you can configure topics, questions, and time.
rules-content-4: 4. In Chaos Mode, everything is random.
rules-content-5: 5. Each question will have an image and four options, one correct.
rules-content-6: 6. You can skip questions if you want.
signup-message-sponsor: Show off your knowledge! Join WiChat and compete by answering questions from different categories. Ready for the challenge?
login-message-sponsor: Welcome back to WiChat! Log in to continue enjoying. We're glad to see you again!
login-failure: Your username or password is incorrect.
auth-error-too-many-attempts: Too many attempts. Try again later.
password-error-content: Password must be at least 8 characters long, contain at least one uppercase letter, one number, and no spaces.
confirm-logout: Are you sure you want to log out?
chaosMode-intro-body: This is the mode where anything can happen. The questions will be random, the times unpredictable, and everything is out of control. Are you ready to face this chaos?
chaosMode-slogan: Each game is different. The only sure thing is surprise
